definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Water-soluble carboxymethyl chitosan was prepared from dried shrimp shells.
sentences.chinese: 以蝦殼爲原料，製備了水溶性羧甲基殼聚糖。

sentences.english: Objective To study the cytotoxicity of chitosan and its water soluble derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究殼聚糖及其水溶性衍生物的細胞毒性。

sentences.english: A similar trend of variation in sorption coefficients was observed.
sentences.chinese: 水溶性有機物的吸着係數也呈同樣的遞變趨勢。

sentences.english: A general program of formulating of recipe suitable for self-drying water-soluble alkyd resin was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了適合於水溶性醇酸樹脂配方設計的通用程序。

sentences.english: In this paper, we report the water soluble antioxidant abstract from useless coffee bean.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了從等外品咖啡豆提取水溶性食品抗氧化劑。

sentences.english: Arabinogalactan is a water soluble gum extracted from the sawdust of Larix gmelinii( Rupr.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯半乳聚糖是從落葉松木屑中提取的水溶性樹膠。

sentences.english: Objective To study water-soluble constituents of Dioscorea zingiberensis in order to seek active components.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究盾葉薯蕷的水溶性化學成分，尋找活性物質。

sentences.english: Therefore, the product the best choice hydrating essence or water-soluble high products.
sentences.chinese: 因此，補水的產品最好選擇精華素或水溶性高的產品。

sentences.english: Study about the craft on the extraction of the water-soluble polysaccharide in the dried orange peel.
sentences.chinese: 對陳皮中水溶性多糖的提取工藝進行研究。

sentences.english: There was significantly positive correlation between WSP content and viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 水溶性戊聚糖含量與籽粒提取液黏度呈極顯著正相關。

sentences.english: Vitamin C, also known as ascorbic acid, is a water-soluble vitamin.
sentences.chinese: 維他命C，又名抗壞血酸，是一種水溶性維生素。

sentences.english: Water-soluble nutrients such as vitamin C are particularly vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 水溶性維生素如維生素C特別容易流失。

sentences.english: Water- soluble sizes are generally used on man- made fibers.
sentences.chinese: 水溶性漿料一般用於人造纖維。

sentences.english: Conclusions Chitosan and its water soluble derivatives have no cytotoxicity.
sentences.chinese: 結論殼聚糖及其水溶性衍生物無細胞毒性。

sentences.english: The extraction design of water -soluble polysaccharide from lentinus edodes was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了從香菇中提取水溶性多糖的優化過程。

sentences.english: The antimicrobial effect of the yeast soluble glucan against various microbe was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了酵母水溶性葡聚糖對各種供試菌的抑菌作用。
